synopsis:
Signs such as circles, points, and lines get together to make a shape of a “bear.” “The bear” starts to walk to find the concrete places and comes across animals in the forest. We tend to find a story in the relationship between “the bear” and other animals.

1st year work 2014, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Director：koya
Music : Miki SAKURAI
producer : Mitsuko OKAMOTO

(Source: Tokyo University of the Arts)
